title: Access Control - Authenticated User Can Access /painel Routes
description: Verify that users authenticated via localStorage key isAuthenticated=true can access all /painel routes.

steps.description: Set localStorage key isAuthenticated = true
Navigate to /painel home route
Verify user is allowed access and painel dashboard is rendered
Navigate to sub routes /painel/home, /painel/footer, /painel/ministries, /painel/dynamic-pages
Verify each route loads the respective editor or page manager component

title: Access Control - Unauthorized User Blocked from /painel Routes
description: Verify that unauthenticated users (localStorage isAuthenticated absent or false) are blocked from accessing /painel routes.

steps.description: Ensure localStorage key isAuthenticated does not exist or is false
Try to navigate to /painel home route
Verify user is redirected to login page or denied access
Try to access deep sub routes under /painel
Verify user remains unauthenticated and access is prevented

title: HomeEditor - Edit and Save Home Content Successfully
description: Verify that updating content in HomeEditor and saving persists data to Supabase and updates public site immediately.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to /painel/home
Modify home page content fields in HomeEditor
Click saveHomeData action/button
Check DatabaseService.saveItem called with correct key and value
Validate success response is handled and UI shows save confirmation
Navigate to public home page
Verify updated content is reflected on public site immediately

title: FooterEditor - Edit and Save Footer Content Successfully
description: Verify footer content edits made in FooterEditor persist to Supabase and update the public site correctly.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to /painel/footer
Modify footer content fields
Click saveFooterData
Validate DatabaseService.saveItem is called with footer key and updated content
Check UI confirms save success
Navigate to public site footer area
Verify footer reflects updated content immediately

title: MinistryEditor - CRUD Operations on Ministry Content
description: Verify that MinistryEditor allows creating, reading, updating, and deleting ministry entries with persistence in Supabase.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to /painel/ministries
Create a new ministry item using MinistryEditor UI
Confirm saveMinistry called with correct data and DatabaseService.saveItem updates backend
Edit existing ministry content
Verify data persisted and UI updates accordingly
Delete a ministry entry
Verify the item is removed from backend and UI updates to reflect deletion
Navigate to public-facing ministry pages
Verify changes to ministries are correctly reflected on public pages immediately

title: Dynamic Pages - List, Add, Update Status, and Delete
description: Validate that dynamic page management supports listing, adding new pages, updating page statuses and deletion with persistence and immediate public site reflection.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to /painel/dynamic-pages
Verify getPages fetches and lists existing pages
Page list reflects current state from database
Add a new dynamic page with valid data
Confirm addPage called and page is persisted
Toggle page status from online to offline and back
UpdatePage reflects status change in DB and UI
Delete a dynamic page
Verify deletePage removes it from DB and UI updates accordingly
Access public site dynamic pages
Verify only pages with status online and correct type are visible; recently added or updated pages show correctly

title: Supabase Content Persistence - Save and Fetch Item Methods
description: Confirm DatabaseService.saveItem and fetchItem methods correctly store and retrieve JSON key-value content to/from Supabase app_content table.

steps.description: Invoke saveItem with sample key and JSON content
Verify data is saved in Supabase table app_content matching key and value
Invoke fetchItem with the same key
Verify returned content matches previously saved JSON data
Test saveItem with invalid data or network failure simulated
Verify errors are handled gracefully and appropriate error notifications shown

title: Routing - ProtectedRoute Component Prevents Unauthorized Access and Allows Authorized Access
description: Ensure ProtectedRoute component correctly reads isAuthenticated from localStorage and either grants access to painel routes or redirects/block unauthorized users.

steps.description: Set localStorage isAuthenticated = true and navigate to /painel/home
Verify routed content is rendered and no redirect occurs
Set localStorage isAuthenticated = false or remove key and navigate to /painel/home
Verify user is redirected out or access denied

title: UI Responsiveness and Consistency for Admin and Public Interfaces
description: Validate that all UI components including editors, dashboard layout, navigation, and public-facing site components are responsive and consistent across devices.

steps.description: Load painel pages (HomeEditor, FooterEditor, MinistriesEditor, DynamicPages) on desktop viewport
Confirm layout is visually consistent with design and fully usable
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile widths
Verify UI components resize or rearrange gracefully without overlap or broken elements
Navigate public-facing pages Home, Ministries, Dynamic pages on varied screen sizes
Validate UI consistency and responsiveness

title: Data Consistency Between Frontend Display and Backend Storage After Content Edits
description: Verify that the data displayed on public site always matches latest saved data from admin painel after any content edit.

steps.description: Authenticate and update Home content in painel; save changes
Verify data persisted in Supabase
Load public home page
Confirm content matches painel updated data exactly
Repeat above steps for Footer and Ministries content
Ensure public site content matches backend persisted data for each case

title: Dynamic Page Status Filter on Public Site
description: Check that only dynamic pages with status set to online are displayed on the public-facing site and offline pages are hidden.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to /painel/dynamic-pages
Set some pages status to online and others to offline
Verify status changes reflected in DatabaseService
Visit public site dynamic pages section
Verify only online status pages are visible
Attempt to access offline page URL directly and confirm page not found or redirected

title: Error Handling - Handle Supabase Network/Server Failures Gracefully
description: Simulate Supabase API failures during content save and fetch operations to verify error handling and user notifications.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or Supabase service error when calling saveItem during Home content save
Verify error message is shown; save button is enabled for retry; no data corruption occurs
Simulate error during fetchItem when HomeEditor loads data
Verify proper fallback UI or error notification is displayed
